# week4assginment

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of week4assginment is to read, summarize and visualize FARS data by year or by state.

## Installation

The pacakge can be installed by:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("proton-2022/week4assignment")
```

## Example

This is a basic example for using the week4assignment package:

```{r example, eval=FALSE}
library(week4assginment)
# read data
dat <- fars_read_years(c(2013, 2014))
# summarize data 
summary_table <- fars_summarize_years(c(2013, 2014))
# visualize data 
fars_map_state(1, 2013)
```

Please see the vignettes for details in usage.
